html:
{{ doc.item_name }}

Item Code: {{ doc.item_code }}
Stock UOM: {{ doc.stock_uom }}
Item Group: {{ doc.item_group }}

1D Barcodes

CODE 128

{{ doc.item_code|barcode('code128') }}

CODE 39

{{ doc.item_code|barcode('code39') }}
{% if doc.item_code|length == 13 %}

EAN-13

{{ doc.item_code|barcode('ean13') }}
{% endif %} {% if doc.item_code|length == 8 %}

EAN-8

{{ doc.item_code|barcode('ean8') }}
{% endif %} {% if doc.item_code|length == 12 %}

UPC-A

{{ doc.item_code|barcode('upca') }}
{% endif %}

QR Codes

Standard QR

{{ doc.item_code|barcode('qr') }}

High Reliability QR

{{ doc.item_code|barcode('qr-h') }}
{% set rich_data = { 'item_code': doc.item_code, 'item_name': doc.item_name, 'uom': doc.stock_uom, 'group': doc.item_group }|tojson %}

Rich Data QR

{{ rich_data|barcode('qr-h') }}

Current Stock Information

{% set total_stock = frappe.db.sql(""" SELECT SUM(actual_qty) as total_qty FROM `tabBin` WHERE item_code = %s """, doc.item_code)[0][0] or 0 %}
Total Stock: {{ total_stock }} {{ doc.stock_uom }}
name: Barcode Format Demo

html:
{{ doc.item_name }}
{{ doc.item_code }}
{{ doc.item_code|barcode('code128', show_text=false) }}
{% set stock = frappe.db.get_value('Bin', {'item_code': doc.item_code, 'warehouse': doc.item_defaults[0].default_warehouse}, 'actual_qty') if doc.item_defaults else 0 %} {{ doc.stock_uom }} Qty: {{ stock }}
name: Compact Shelf Label

css:
<style>
.inventory-sheet {
    padding: 0.5in;
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
}

header {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc;
}

header h1 {
    font-size: 18pt;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.meta-info {
    display: flex;
    gap: 2rem;
    color: #666;
}

.barcode-section {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
    align-items: center;
    margin: 1rem 0;
    padding: 1rem;
    border: 1px solid #eee;
    border-radius: 4px;
}

.qr-container svg {
    height: 1.2in;
    width: 1.2in;
}

.barcode-container svg {
    height: 0.4in;
    width: 2in;
}

.stock-overview {
    margin: 1rem 0;
}

.stock-overview h2 {
    font-size: 14pt;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

table {
    width: 100%;
    border-collapse: collapse;
    margin: 0.5rem 0;
}

th, td {
    padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem;
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
    font-size: 9pt;
}

th {
    background-color: #f5f5f5;
}

.text-right {
    text-align: right;
}

.qr-cell {
    width: 1in;
    padding: 0.125in;
}

.qr-cell svg {
    width: 0.75in;
    height: 0.75in;
}

.details-grid {
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: 1rem;
}

.details-grid td {
    padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem;
    font-size: 9pt;
}

@media print {
    .inventory-sheet {
        padding: 0;
    }
    
    table {
        page-break-inside: avoid;
    }
}
</style>
html:
{{ doc.item_name }}

Item Code: {{ doc.item_code }}
Stock UOM: {{ doc.stock_uom }}
Date: {{ frappe.utils.format_date(frappe.utils.today()) }}
{{ doc.item_code|barcode('qr-m') }}
{{ doc.item_code|barcode('code128') }}

Current Stock Levels

{% set warehouse_stocks = frappe.db.sql(""" SELECT warehouse, actual_qty, reserved_qty, actual_qty - reserved_qty as available_qty FROM `tabBin` WHERE item_code = %s AND (actual_qty > 0 OR reserved_qty > 0) ORDER BY warehouse """, doc.item_code, as_dict=1) %} {% for stock in warehouse_stocks %} {% endfor %}
Warehouse In Stock Reserved Available QR Code
{{ stock.warehouse }} {{ stock.actual_qty }} {{ stock.reserved_qty or 0 }} {{ stock.available_qty }} {% set wh_data = { 'type': 'stock_entry', 'item_code': doc.item_code, 'warehouse': stock.warehouse, 'qty': stock.actual_qty, 'uom': doc.stock_uom }|tojson %} {{ wh_data|barcode('qr-m') }}
Total {{ warehouse_stocks|sum(attribute='actual_qty') }} {{ warehouse_stocks|sum(attribute='reserved_qty') }} {{ warehouse_stocks|sum(attribute='available_qty') }}
Item Group: {{ doc.item_group }} Valuation Rate: {{ frappe.format_value(doc.valuation_rate, {"fieldtype": "Currency"}) }}
Last Purchase: {{ frappe.format_value(frappe.db.get_value("Item Price", {"item_code": doc.item_code, "buying": 1}, "price_list_rate"), {"fieldtype": "Currency"}) }} Last Purchase Date: {{ frappe.format_date(frappe.db.get_value("Purchase Receipt Item", {"item_code": doc.item_code}, "modified")) }}
name: Inventory Sheet with QR Codes
